pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, February 16, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Nassau, The Bahamas

Private meetings

8:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of the Commonwealth of The Bahamas, Philip Davis.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Barbados, Mia Mottley.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

10:00 a.m.  The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Jamaica, Andrew Holness.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Haiti, Ariel Henry.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a plenary session and deliver remarks.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a family photo.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a working luncheon given by the Prime Minister of the Commonwealth of The Bahamas, Philip Davis.

Closed to media

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

9:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa.

Closed to media
